name: resume
description: Nathan Storey resume using JSON Resume schema, built to HTML/PDF and published via GitHub Pages.

scripts.build:html: mkdir -p docs && resume export docs/index.html --theme ./themes/jsonresume-theme-custom --resume src/resume.json
scripts.build:pdf: mkdir -p docs && resume export docs/Nathan_Storey_Resume.pdf --format pdf --theme ./themes/jsonresume-theme-custom --resume src/resume.json
scripts.build: npm run build:html && npm run build:pdf
scripts.build:private: node scripts/build-private.js && mkdir -p docs && resume export docs/Nathan_Storey_Resume_Private.pdf --format pdf --theme ./themes/jsonresume-theme-custom --resume src/resume.private.json
